Share your closets with other users
Show events throughout the country

business_plans.name: Budding Star
business_plans.description: Aspiring influencers, bloggers, stylists, personal shoppers
business_plans.benefits: Able to monetize your base by selling shopping packages

plan_features.feature: Sell shopping packages and make commissions from packages
Catalogue and keep a closet inventory
Inspire other CASA BEAU MONDE users by sharing your closet inspirations
Help other users breathe magic into their existing wardrobes
Create new connections with new followers
Build relationships and opportunities to collaborate with new brands, retailers and boutiques
Paid partnerships and collaborations with CASA BEAU MONDE retail partners
60% commission split on all paid projects completed through CASA BEAU MONDE
Earn up to $250 a month in commissions
Chat support
